.. _singularity_oci_umount:

singularity oci umount
----------------------

Umount delete bundle (root user only)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  Umount will umount an OCI bundle previously mounted with singularity oci 
  mount.

::

  singularity oci umount <bundle_path>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ singularity oci umount /var/lib/singularity/bundles/example

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for umount

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity oci <singularity_oci>` 	 - Manage OCI containers

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 2-Jul-2021*
